Crown of Madness

Level 2 Enchantment Spell

Instil madness in a humanoid enemy, making them attack the creature closest to them (other than you), even if it's allied.

18m WIS Save Concentration

Crown of Madness is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Crown of Madness is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Crown of Madness Information

Description: Instill madness in a humanoid enemy, making them attack the creature closest to them (other than you), even if it's allied. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Duration: 3 turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Wisdom

How to Acquire Crown of Madness

Crown of Madness can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Oathbreaker Crown of Madness can be cast by using the following Items: Kruznabir's Asylum Amulet
